stock.model

Class PortfolioManagerModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • stock.model.PortfolioManagerModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPortfolioManagerModel, PersistentPortfolioManagerModel

    public class PortfolioManagerModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements PersistentPortfolioManagerModel
    A class that implements the PortfolioManagerModel. It allows to create portfolios but ensures uniqueness in the name of portfolios. An object of this class is represented in its string form as the name of all portfolios in its collection.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a portfolio manager object.

    • Method Detail

      • createPortfolio

        public void createPortfolio(java.lang.String portfolioName)
        Description copied from interface: IPortfolioManagerModel
        Creates an empty portfolio with the given name and adds it to its collection. A portfolio name has to be unique hence duplicate names will result in error.
        Specified by:
        createPortfolio in interface IPortfolioManagerModel
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - the unique name for the portfolio.

      • addToPortfolio

        public void addToPortfolio(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                           Strategy strategy)
        Description copied from interface: IPortfolioManagerModel
        Applies a strategy of adding stocks to this portfolio.
        Specified by:
        addToPortfolio in interface IPortfolioManagerModel
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - the portfolio name on which the strategy will be applied.
        strategy - the strategy object that defines how stocks will be added.

      • getContentsOn

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getContentsOn(java.lang.String name,
                                                                       java.time.LocalDateTime date)
        Description copied from interface: IPortfolioManagerModel
        Returns the contents of a portfolio as information of the stocks within the portfolio.
        Specified by:
        getContentsOn in interface IPortfolioManagerModel
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the portfolio whose contents are required.
        date - the date at which the contents are required.
        Returns:
        a map with key as ticker symbol and value as quantity of stocks.

      • getPortfolioCostBasis

        public double getPortfolioCostBasis(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                                    java.time.LocalDateTime date)
        Description copied from interface: IPortfolioManagerModel
        Returns the cost basis,i.e. the buying cost of the portfolio.
        Specified by:
        getPortfolioCostBasis in interface IPortfolioManagerModel
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - the name of the portfolio whose cost is to be determined.
        Returns:
        the total cost it took to buy all the stocks in this portfolio.
